reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that data is collected from users in various forms, which indicates that the app declares the collection of data.
reply.reference: We collect, use, and store the information described below. ... The information we collect is received directly or indirectly from you and generated in the course of your use of the Sites. URL: https://www.mind-diagnostics.org/pages/privacy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies the types of data collected under Visitor Data, Test Information, and Reviews.
reply.reference: Visitor Data: We collect, use, and store data regarding user visits to its website and use of the application (“Visitor Data”), including the particular pages visited or viewed by the user, the amount of time the user spent on the Sites, website errors experienced by the user, and information about the browser or device used to access the website and application, such as the user’s mobile device ID and IP address. Test Information: We collect the test responses provided by users, as well as pages viewed by the user, whether the user clicks a link to begin completing a test, and whether the user responds to any of the test prompts. Reviews: We collect the information you provide if leaving reviews on the Site. URL: https://www.mind-diagnostics.org/pages/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use as outlined in the Privacy Policy.

reply.analysis: The Privacy Policy clearly states that the app declares the purpose of data collection and use, specifying that the information collected is used for various purposes as detailed in the policy.
reply.reference: Protecting this information is important for us. Other than in the ways detailed in this Privacy Policy, we will never use or disclose any information unless you requested or approved us to do so. Purposes for Which Information is Used. URL: https://www.mind-diagnostics.org/pages/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users can request the deletion of their data if necessary, indicating that users have the option to opt out of data collection or delete their data.
reply.reference: If you are aware that we have collected Personal Information from a user under age of 18 please let us know by contacting us and we will delete that information. URL: https://www.mind-diagnostics.org/pages/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as necessary for facilitating tasks related to the site or providing services, ensuring the minimum necessary information is shared.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may employ third party companies and individuals to perform tasks related to the site or provide services, sharing only the minimum necessary information with them.
reply.reference: We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Site, to perform certain tasks which are related to the Site, or to provide audit, legal, operational or other services for us. These tasks include, but not limited to, customer service, technical maintenance, monitoring, email management and communication, database management, billing and payment processing, reporting and analytics. We will share with them only the minimum necessary information to perform their task for us and only after entering into appropriate confidentiality agreements. URL: https://www.mind-diagnostics.org/pages/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Website or service operators accessed through Social and General Information Tools, third-party advertising networks, and similar partners

content: Website or service operators accessed through Social and General Information Tools
Third-party advertising networks and similar partners

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing data with third parties, including information accessed through Social and General Information Tools and third-party advertising networks, indicating the involvement of specific entities outside the app.
reply.reference: Website or service operators accessed through Social and General Information Tools, third-party advertising networks, and similar partners. URL: https://www.mind-diagnostics.org/pages/privacy
